alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Gusty showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Harding, western Butte, northwestern Perkins, northwestern Lawrence, Campbell, western Weston and Crook Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Mud Buttes to 12 miles southeast of Red Wall. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Wyoming and far northwestern South Dakota. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 4. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 96 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins
